gameEntity.name: Age
gameEntity.description: Young dragonborn grow quickly. They walk hours after hatching, attain the size and development of a 10-year-old human child by the age of 3, and reach adulthood by 15. They live to be around 80.

gameEntity.name: Draconic Ancestry
gameEntity.description: Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by your dragon type

gameEntity.name: Acid Damage Resistance
gameEntity.description: You have resistance to acid damage

gameEntity.name: Acid Breath Weapon
gameEntity.description:
You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. When you use your breath weapon, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a saving throw.
The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes damage based on level for a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one.
After you use your breath weapon, you can’t use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

gameEntity.name: Lightning Damage Resistance
gameEntity.description: You have resistance to lightning damage

gameEntity.name: Lightning Breath Weapon
gameEntity.description:
You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. When you use your breath weapon, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a saving throw.
The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes damage based on level for a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one.
After you use your breath weapon, you can’t use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

gameEntity.name: Dwarven Resilience
gameEntity.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, and you have resistance against poison damage.
